title: Gursharan Kaur - Wikipedia
snippet: Gursharan Kaur Kohli (born 13 September 1937) is an Indian history professor, author who served as the former Spouse of the Prime Minister of India a widow of the former Prime Minister of India, Dr. Manmohan Singh.
